REGULAR.description:
- Is this place really all that...? This heaven... -
The Angelic Guard, who call the heavens their home, have been tasked with collecting the orbs scattered across the world. Lucifer—a leader of the Angelic Guard with a rebellious streak, said to wield power rivaling the Almighty—carries out her duty along with Uriel, also a leader of the guard. Together, they go about executing their mission, until...
Source: Official YouTube

- We cannot let that happen again. -
Holy Magistrate Keter—the one who leads the heavens under the Almighty`s will—tells Uriel of Lucifer`s planned rebellion. Initially in disbelief, Uriel then learns that the accusations against Lucifer may be connected to an event that once threatened to shatter the heavens...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 天界に鳴り響く不協和音

REGULAR.description:
- I believed in you... and yet! -
Uriel is shocked as she discovers the Orb that Lucifer has been hiding. 
Lucifer gives her no time to ask questions—quickly engaging Uriel in battle. 
To protect the heavens, Uriel reaches for a blade in the face of her hostile friend...
Source: Official YouTube

- All hail King Grouch! -
After many moons, Castle Grouch is finally completed. 
The king and his subjects are overjoyed until Lucifer`s craft plummets from the skies above...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 我輩はキングクロッチ!

REGULAR.description:
- There`s nowhere to run. -
Gabriel finds Lucifer at the Falls of Rejuvenation and requests the suspected traitor`s surrender...
Source: Official YouTube

-Let`s end this. -
As Lucifer`s incursion upon the heavens approaches, Raphael stands to oppose her. 
Meanwhile, Michael and Gabriel have discovered Lucifer`s true intentions and race to the heavens to prevent the unthinkable...
Source: Official YouTube

-We could have saved you... -
They were as close as sisters once, but now Lucifer and Uriel face off as two unwavering worldviews collide. 
In an explosive flurry of blades, their faith, honor, and friendship are put to the test...
Source: Official YouTube

- I rule the Fallen! -
The end has finally come as Lucifer and Uriel work together to challenge the mighty Keter. Will Lucifer be able to save the Heavens...?
Source: Official YouTube

- I`ll help you find your friends! -
After breaking the seal on a forbidden chest housing a thousand calamities, 
Pandora struggles to gather the escaped disasters for the sake of the last Despair Imp left in the chest...
Source: Official YouTube

- Leave it to us! Eyes open, lips sealed! -
Unseen forces have dispatched two mysterious individuals to acertain Lucifer`s whereabouts. 
Meanwhile, Uriel awakens to a world scarred from the battle prior.
Source: Official YouTube

- Who are those two, anyway? -
Uriel and the others have had their powers taken from them by the mysterious archangels Sandalphon and Metatron. The four of them devise a plan to take back what was stolen from them...
Source: Official YouTube

- Our friendship is also limitless! -
Uriel and Gabriel make battle with the twins Metatron and Sandalphon. 
Neither side relents, but Gabriel and company begin to feel the pinch as their 
opponents grow in power...
Source: Official YouTube

- People of Britannia! I`ve returned! -
At long last, Arthur returns to her home kingdom of Britannia. 
But when she steps foot into her beloved Camelot, she finds calamity has befallen her people...
Source: Official YouTube

- I`ll go to protect our land and its people. -
Arthur, Merlin, and Hamsel embark upon their journey to save the people of Britannia.
They arrive in Lancelot`s domain, but what they find is not what they expect...
Source: Official YouTube

- You are not fit to rule! -
Lancelot attacks Arthur without warning. 
What will Arthur do when faced against 
a trusted friend and Knight of the Round Table...?
Source: Official YouTube

- Lend me your power once more! -
Lancelot, Arthur, and company make their way through a labyrinthine forest. 
When Merlin gets separated from the group, however...
Source: Official YouTube

- So long as my comrades are with me, I`ll never accept defeat! -
The terrible Beast of Badon Hill has shown its true form to Arthur and the others.
Can Arthur defeat the monster and restore hope to the people of Britannia...?
Source: Official YouTube

- Life has become such a bore. -
The fallen Lucifer attempts to infiltrate a prison fortress housing the most heinous of felons. 
Her plan is a mystery, but one thing is certain: her insurrection has only just begun...!
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 堕天使ルシファー, 始動!

REGULAR.description:
- Life has become such a bore. -
Binah reveals to Uriel and company the horrifying evil which the Hallowed Decemviri plot.
Meanwhile, Beelzebub tells Lucifer and Xaphan that destroying Surgat—the ancient weapon they seek—is impossible. 
Lucifer, however, is unfazed...
Source: Official YouTube

-Life has become such a bore. -
Lucifer and company have reached the Underworld. 
The place Beelzebub brings them to is a graveyard: a swirling whirlpool of despair, regret, and malice. 
Lucifer and Xaphan enter the fray in search of the device to control Surgat, but...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 突入! アビスインフェルノ

REGULAR.description:
- We`ll stop the enemy, no matter the cost. -
In the Heavens, Uriel and the archangels strengthen their defenses to protect the final shrine. 
Meanwhile in the Underworld, Chokhmah succeeds in reviving Surgat.
Will Lucifer and company be able to thwart the Decemviri`s heinous plans...?!
Source: Official YouTube

I promise I will avenge the Almighty.
Surgat`s Lightning of Destruction has felled the Tree of Life. 
Xaphan, downtrodden and enraged at her failure to protect the Almighty, confronts Chokhmah alone...
Source: Official YouTube

- Burn it all to ash! -
An enraged Xaphan uses Surgat to capture Chokhmah.
When she attempts to finally exact vengeance,
however...
Source: Official YouTube

-Plans change.-
Unleashed and out of control, 
Surgat begins a storm of destruction. In a desperate attempt to prevent calamity,
Lucifer and Xaphan risk it all...
Source: Official YouTube

- Don`t worry. I`ll keep everyone safe! -
In the land of Lecillia, two young women compete for their country`s throne.
Solomon, descendant of Lecillia`s first king, and Levy, daughter to the second king.
Longing to preserve peace and joy among her people, Solomon commits to her studies day after day, yet her efforts always seem in vain.
One night, however, she has a mysterious dream...
Source: Official YouTube

- I succeeded in my first summoning! -
Solomon summons the demon Forneus, the Great Marquis of the Netherworld, and Cassiel, the Angel of Tears and Solitude.
While she rejoices over the success of her ritual, Forneus is less than pleased...
Source: Official YouTube

- Don`t undo the seal! You can`t! -
When the royal alarm is raised, Solomon rushes to investigate—the palace vault has been infiltrated.
The culprit turns out to be none other than Levy herself. Solomon tries to stop her, but...
Source: Official Youtube

- I warned you, didn`t I? -
As Solomon and Levy face off within the vault,
Balt arrives and begins to reprimand them.
Things escalate when Forneus appears and
the devastating truth is revealed...
Source: Official YouTube

- I`ll go to the ends of the world to keep my people safe. -
Balt places a curse over all of Lecillia,
then disappears along with the Orb.
Solomon and Levy both work in their own ways to lift the curse,
but...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: Tenshi no Sukui to Akuma no Michibiki
天使の救いと悪魔の導き

REGULAR.description:
- Those saps are goners. -
With Forneus and Cassiel,
Solomon seeks out Balt to save her people.
Along the way, however,
Forneus senses that Lecillia is in danger...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: Hitomi ni Utsuru Ma no Te

REGULAR.description:
- I`ll protect everyone! -
Solomon and Levy have successfully held off the Great Sands` invasion on Lecillia.
But an even greater threat draws near...
Source: Official YouTube

- I`ll protect Lecillia my way. -
Solomon has been taken captive by the Scyzari Empire.
The guilt of endangering Lecillia weighs heavily on Levy`s heart.
What does fate have in store for these two daughters of Lecillia...
Source: Official YouTube

- Promise me that you will protect the smiles of the people. -
Many moons ago, Malkuth, newly-risen emperor of Scyzari,
called for an audience with the First King of Lecillia. Not even the king,
however, could have imaged Malkuth`s dreadful intentions,
or the harrowing events that young Solomon would witness...
Source: YouTube

- If it would save my people... my life`s a small price to pay! -
Solomon resolves to save her people, even if it means giving up her life.
Meanwhile, Balt attempts to access the forbidden book of demons...
Source: Youtube

- The light of Lecillia will not be snuffed out... -
Levy stands face-to-face with her father`s murderer,
Malkuth. Does her ice magic stand a chance against this mighty foe?
Source: YouTube

- I won`t let you get away with this! -
Solomon`s newly-awakened power summons forth Forneus` true form.
In a grand display of his power,
the Great Marquis of the Netherworld tries to stop Malkuth, however...
Source: YouTube

- I`m not alone. -
Solomon and Levy finally unite to
protect their beloved people.
The final battle against the now
almighty Malkuth is at hand...
Source: YouTube

- So long as I hold Excalibur, Britannia will never fall! -
Arthur`s nation of Britannia holds a festival to honor her sacred sword Excalibur,
but the festivities are interrupted suddenly by strange music coming from the skies...
Source: YouTube

- Is this how you treat your comrades?! -
Arthur awakens on the deck of a pirate ship after being spirited away
from danger by the Knights of the Round Table.
To return to Britannia, she attempts to prove that she is its ruler...
Source: YouTube

- Fine by me, Arthur. Drinks are on you. -
Arthur travels to Northumberland in search of Caliburn,
which she believes will help her defeat Tiphereth.
She hears a commotion when searching for her mentor, to whom she entrusted the blade...
Source: YouTube

titles.title: ぺリノアはかく語りき

REGULAR.description:
- I became Britannia`s rightful ruler when I first drew Caliburn. -
Arthur learns of Caliburn`s location from the owner of a pawn shop
and is guided towards the sword.
She finds herself in an eerie place littered with blades...
Source: YouTube

- Then die where you stand. -
Arthur faces her fellow pupil Arawin in battle, but something inside him has changed after all these years.
What can Arthur do to stand against his bloodlust and magic blade...?!
Source: YouTube

- I can`t maintain this form! -
The fearsome Decemvir Tiphereth would even block out the sun with a disco ball in the name of beauty. Arthur`s group returns to Britannia,
but can they save her neon-coated friends and people...?
Source: YouTube

-Our spirits are one, now and forever!-
Arthur confronts Tiphereth`s true form.
With her country and life on the line, she stands firm in a heated battle against the Decemvir`s enhanced strength.
Who will come out on top of their intense battle...?
Source: YouTube

- We`ll all escape this planet together. -
On a world where nearly all life has been wiped out, a young man named Noah gathers Orb Fragments to power his ark, dreaming of one day escaping the planet with its surviving animals. One day, some strange life forms fall from the sky! Who—or what—could they be...?!
Source: YouTube

- You... don`t have any friends, do you? -
After setting off in search of a giant Orb,
Noah and the others are attacked by a strange creature called an Adaptor.
The group manages to defeat the beast and later spends the night in a deserted town.
There Noah reveals the origins of his mechanical body,
just before they face a terrible new foe...!
Source: YouTube

- We made a deal! A pinky swear! -
Noah`s group discovers an enormous Orb,
but it`s deep inside an Adaptor nest!
Chesed makes a pinky swear with Noah before going off on
his own to collect the Orb`s energy. However...
Source: YouTube

- I promised that we`d leave this planet together! -
"I`ll be taking your ark!" proclaims Chesed as he vanishes.
Opeco raises her suspicions, but Noah chooses to trust Chesed.
Noah clings to this belief as he continues his fight, even as the adaptors grow in number and the cave begins to collapse...
Source: YouTube

-Why are you taking this so far?!-
The ark finally takes off!
Chesed wants to hurry and escape the planet, but Noah`s wish to bring the animals with them slows them down.
And what`s more, a gargantuan Adaptor attacks, preventing their escape.
Noah finds himself on the brink, completely unable to move...!
Source: YouTube

- Show it... what we`re made of. -
The Adaptor finally shows its true form to Noah, whose life has been saved by Chesed.
Noah makes his final stand to save the animals and his friends from the unimaginably massive Adaptor...!
Source: YouTube

- I love yooou! Lucifeeer! -
His pure hatred for Lucifer is enough to bring
the wicked Decimvir Keter back into this world.
However, his scorn changes to twisted feelings of love!
In a recovering Heaven, Keter forces Uriel and the other
Archangels into a diabolical game...!
Source: YouTube

- If only Lucifer were here right now... -
To save the Heavens, Lucifer meets the Eleventh Decemvir, Da`at, whose strength is more than meets the eye.
Meanwhile, Keter`s Challenge begins to weigh upon the bonds between the Archangels...
Source: YouTube

- Don`t underestimate our bonds!-
The Mirror of Truth, whose power could have revealed Keter, has been shattered, and Michael`s suspicions turn to Ramiel.
Believing in the bond they`ve forged through the countless battles they braved together,
Camael protects Ramiel, but loss has pushed Michael beyond reason...
Source: YouTube

- Can we end this game, already? -
The twins Metatron and Sandalphon have absolute faith in one another, so they deduce that Keter must be inside either Michael or Gabriel.
Showing no mercy, they attack!
All the while, Lucifer is still unable to overcome the challenges of her training.
Will the Heavens be left to the mercy of Keter...?!
Source: YouTube

- Friendship is so beautiful, and so foolish! -
The climax of Keter`s Challenge has finally arrived! Has Keter been in Michael all along?!
Or is Gabriel the impostor?! Neither side will yield, and a heated battle unfolds.
Seeing the terrible fate that has befallen her former comrades,
Lucifer forcibly ends the Trial of Light and races toward the Heavens...!
Source: YouTube

-Let me feel more of who you are! -
Lucifer, enraged by seeing her friends turned to stone, finally confronts Keter and his twisted affections! With the strength she`s gained from her training, Lucifer unleashes a torrent of blows on the Decemvir, but...!
Source: YouTube

-Let there be light. -
Though her training was left unfinished, Lucifer`s bond with her friends brings about a miracle! With the battle between Lucifer and the revived Keter nearing its end, what will become of the petrified angels...?!
Source: YouTube

- Playing knight with that toy on your belt? -
Lucifer, Arthur, Solomon, Noah, and Pandora meet in the Heavens to save Strike World!
However, Lucifer refuses to join them.
As the battle against the evil Decemviri unfolds, will the divided heroes stand a chance...?
Source: YouTube

- I was told to bring you back with me. -
The Heroes make their move after they find out that Caesar has taken her to the enemy`s base of operations.
Why did the evil Decemviri Yesod call for her?
And what does he have in store for her...?!
Source: YouTube

- Just stay alive! -
The Heroes arrive at the Death Gate on Noah`s ark, only to be caught in a trap!
Lucifer flies off on her own, while Yesod and Binah`s shocking past comes to light.
Source: YouTube

- Worry about yourself! -
As Lucifer is being overwhelmed by Yesod,
Arthur arrives to turn the tides!
Can their teamwork triumph over the
Decemvir`s incredible strength?!
Source: YouTube

- I am no longer afraid. -
After losing his beloved Binah,
Yesod activates the Death Gate to destroy Strike World.
There`s no time to waste! Can Lucifer and the others
stop the Death Gate before it`s too late...?!
Source: YouTube

- The light of our worlds will never fade! -
Supported by Binah`s newly awakened powers,
the Heroes begin their climactic battle with Yesod!
The fate of Strike World hangs in the balance!
Source: YouTube

titles.title: ルシファー -反逆の堕天使- 総集編
モンスターストライク The Animation
